title: ICAI Elects CA. Prasanna Kumar D as President and CA. Mangesh Pandurang Kinare as Vice-President for 2026–27 Term
content:
# ICAI Elects CA. Prasanna Kumar D as President and CA. Mangesh Pandurang Kinare as Vice-President for 2026–27 Term

Ek important update hai for all Chartered Accountants! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne apni new leadership announce ki hai for the upcoming term.

*   The 26th Council of ICAI has elected **CA. Prasanna Kumar D** as the President for the term 2026–27.
*   **CA. Mangesh Pandurang Kinare** has been elected as the Vice-President for the same term.
*   Their tenure officially started from February 12, 2026.
*   CA. Prasanna Kumar D will serve as the 74th President of ICAI.

This development marks a new chapter for the profession under their leadership.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/new_category.html?category_id=141872)

*Published on: 13 February 2026*
